entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as 'they' and 'Harry'. The text describes Harry's actions and thoughts throughout the scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, also a student at Hogwarts. She is described as having charmed shut the door and crawling out from under the desk to get a better aim.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Another friend of Harry's, mentioned as diving under desks with him and Hermione.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who are enemies of the main characters. They are described as wearing robes and having wands.

relationships.description: Harry is attacking the Death Eaters with his wand, shouting 'STUPEFY!'
The second Death Eater points his wand at Hermione, who has crawled out from under the desk to get a better aim.
Harry is trying to protect Hermione by casting a spell at the Death Eaters.
